Class TiUART

  • java.lang.Object
    • tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiUART

  • public class TiUART
extends Object
    The TiUART for devicecenter of framework.
    Author:
    Andy.

    • Method Detail

      • available

        public int available()
              throws IOException
        Check read available
        Returns:
        available length
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • clear

        public void clear(int buffer)
           throws IOException
        Clear the data buffer
        Parameters:
        buffer - data buffer type,
        BUFF_READ: read buffer
        BUFF_WRITE: write buffer
        BUFF_WR: write and read buffer
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close the port of current object
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Gets the port id of current object
        Returns:
        the port id

      • open

        public static TiUART open(int portID)
                   throws IOException
        Open the TiUART port by port id, and return the object
        NOTE1: control is CONTROL_NONE, that is default flow control type
        NOTE2: remapID is 0, that is default location
        Parameters:
        portID - port id
        Returns:
        TiUART object
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • openRemap

        public static TiUART openRemap(int portID,
                               int control,
                               int remapID)
                        throws IOException
        Open the TiUART port by port id, flow control type and remap id, and return the object
        Parameters:
        portID - port id
        control - flow control type,
        CONTROL_NONE: none, default
        CONTROL_HARDWARE: RTS/CTS(hardware mode)
        FCONTROL_SOFTWARE: xON/xOFF(software mode)
        remapID - the remap Id, range:0-3
        Returns:
        the opened TiUART object
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • portNumber

        public static int portNumber()
        Maximum number of port supported
        Returns:
        number

      • read

        public int read(byte[] data,
                int offset,
                int len)
         throws IOException
        Read date from receive data buffer
        Parameters:
        data - data array
        offset - data offset
        len - data length
        Returns:
        read length, >0 data length, 0:none
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs
        NullPointerException - If data is null
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

      • setWorkParameters

        public void setWorkParameters(int dataBitNum,
                              int stopBitNum,
                              int parity,
                              int baudRate)
                       throws IOException
        Set work parameters
        Parameters:
        dataBitNum - data bit number,
        5:5bits
        6:6bits
        7:7bits
        8:8bits, default
        9:9bits
        stopBitNum - stop bit number,
        STOPBIT_1, default
        STOPBIT_2,
        STOPBIT_0_5,
        STOPBIT_1_5
        parity - data parity type,
        PARITY_NONE: none, default
        PARITY_ODD: odd
        PARITY_EVEN: even
        baudRate - data baud rate
        1200:1200bps
        2400:2400bps
        4800:4800bps
        9600:9600bps, default
        19200:19200bps
        ....:....
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs

      • write

        public int write(byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
          throws IOException
        Write date to send data buffer
        Parameters:
        data - data array
        offset - data offset
        len - data length
        Returns:
        write length
        Throws:
        IOException - If a TiUART error occurs
        NullPointerException - If data is null
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range
